snippet: Doctors said Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton would make a full recovery after being treated for several days for a blood clot in a vein in her head.
abstract: Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton is discharged from New York hospital after several days of treatment for blood clot in a vein in her head; doctors say she will make a full recovery.

byline.original: By DENISE GRADY and MARK LANDLER

lead_paragraph: Doctors said Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton would make a full recovery after being treated for several days for a blood clot in a vein in her head.

headline.seo: Hillary Clinton Is Discharged From Hospital After Blood Clot
headline.main: Clinton Out of Hospital After Treatment for Clot
headline.print_headline: Clinton Out of Hospital After Treatment for Clot
